descriptionHTML:
YSAR watch faces are specially made to satisfy the needs of most exigent smart watch owners, who got used to wearing stylish watches. Our luxurious and elegant faces powered with battery indicator, calendar and analog time zone watch will add significant value to any android smart watch.

Watch faces by YSAR Design are compatible with both round and square android wear smartwatches: Moto 360, Asus ZenWatch, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, LG Watch Urbane, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3, Huawei Watch etc...

Custom features:
- Battery indicator
- Date
- Analog time zone watch
- Advanced and luxury design with superb readability

Our watch faces are available in settings right after you download from store and are simple in being set up. YSAR watch faces do not require much energy, so your smartwatch will operate for almost the same period of time as usual.
